You make this sound like Monster Rancher (I would say
pokemon, but pokemon don't die in that game monsters
do). Speaking of which I just got Monster Rancher
Advanced and let me tell you, if you were annoyed with
Monster Rancher battle cards Nintendo has far from
embarrassed itself THIS time.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> If that's what happens, then it'll happen. But be
> warned, once he 
> starts fighting, he will not stop until the other is
> in coma or 
> straight dead.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > OOC: Do you simple mean a better dragon than he
> was
> > before, or the best dragon in the game.  If the
> later
> > I propose A DUEL ONE ON ONE BETWEEN AZURE BLADE
> AND
> > SHADOW STAR!  HEY AND IF HE'S SO GREAT WHY STOP
> THERE
> > IF CYBERWOLF EVER SHOWS UP AGAIN WE CAN GET
> MEGATON
> > AND SHADOW STAR TO FIGHT TOGETHER!
> 
> 
>
